title: KantanMT.com Appoints Brian Baird to Its Board of Directors
text:
KantanMT.com Appoints Brian Baird to Its Board of Directors
An expanding KantanMT Team strengthens strategic vision with international marketing veteran.
Dublin, Ireland, September 12, 2015 --( PR.com )-- KantanMT.com is pleased to announce the appointment of Brian Baird to its Board of Directors. Brian brings a wealth of strategic marketing and senior management experience to the KantanMT Team.
Brain has 35+ years’ experience in senior management roles and has been involved in several successful start-ups. Brian’s main expertise lies in strategic marketing and go-to-market activities, and he will use this background and experience to help KantanMT accelerate its rapid growth in the $1 billion global machine translation marketplace.
“This is a very exciting time for KantanMT.com, the young, fast-growing company is offering a machine translation solution that is unmatched in the industry for speed, scalability, simplicity and security,” says, Brian Baird, Director at KantanMT. “I am delighted and grateful for the opportunity to be part of a dynamic and customer focused team that is reshaping the MT marketplace and expanding its services and revenues so rapidly.”
Brian’s appointment to the board coincides with an ever-expanding team as KantanMT also welcomes five new hires to the company in the roles of Machine Translation Project Coordinator, MT Developer, Content Developer and two Software Developers.
“I’m delighted to be welcoming Brian to the Board of Directors at KantanMT.com,” said Tony O’Dowd, Founder and Chief Architect at KantanMT.com. “Brain has immense knowledge and expertise in sales and marketing and he will be an invaluable part of our team as we continue the expansion and growth of our platform and services for our KantanMT community.”
To learn more about KantanMT, send an email to info@kantanmt.com.
About KantanMT
KantanMT.com is a leading SaaS based machine translation platform that enables users to develop and manage customised machine translation engines in the cloud. The innovative technologies offered on the KantanMT.com platform enables members to build MT engines in over 750 language combinations, seamlessly integrating into localization workflows and web applications. KantanMT is based in the INVENT Building, DCU Campus, Dublin 9.
